Constructor Detail

Facade

public Facade()
The default No-Arg Constructor sets up a DataAccessObject instance.

Facade

public Facade(java.lang.String txnID)
Constructs a Resource instance with the given txnID. The txnID is used for logging and troubleshooting.

Parameters:
txnID - A transaction id that was generated and passed-in by an upstream class.
Method Detail

getTxnID

public java.lang.String getTxnID()

setTxnID

public void setTxnID(java.lang.String txnID)
Sets the txnID on this object using the given txnID. If for some reason the supplied string is blank or null, we'll create our own UUID to use as the txnID.

Parameters:
txnID - A (hopefully) unique identifier for a given transaction.
